body_html:
I'll edit the symbolics to preserve the Flatten semantics. I finally managed to get onnx-fb-universe to build and run locally without any errors.

This patch will be a bit involved, because once a node gets a dynamically traced size/shape, all the arguments become positional arguments (like tensors) instead of node attributes! This means that there's a bunch more parsing to be done in the symbolics, and they need to handle this new variant in all nodes that take sizes.

This means that there's a bunch more parsing to be done in the symbolics, and they need to handle this new variant in all nodes that take sizes.
body:
I'll edit the symbolics to preserve the Flatten semantics. I finally managed to get onnx-fb-universe to build and run locally without any errors.

This patch will be a bit involved, because once a node gets a dynamically traced size/shape, all the arguments become positional arguments (like tensors) instead of node attributes! This means that there's a bunch more parsing to be done in the symbolics, and they need to handle this new variant in all nodes that take sizes.
